item.description:
Lets kick this season off right with the Warren Miller Movie and some pre-drinks and food at Orleans Restaurant in Davis Sq Somerville. This years movie is called "Wintervention" and looks like a great movie - check out the trailer. http://www.skinet.com...

5:30pm Early arrivals at Orleans - come early if you want to order food.
6:40pm Somerville Theatre - We will sit in the center of balcony
9:30pm When movie lets out we will be back at Orleans for a larger celebration

--------------

Warren Miller movies are the gold standard for all ski/snowboard movies. Every Fall for 50 years the Warren Miller team has toured the country to show off its latest creation. It is not just a movie, its an event.

The ticket price ($20) may seem like a lot for a movie BUT you get several 2 for 1 lift tickets and other give-aways. You will make back your admission price - some years i go twice just to get the deals :).

The movie starts at 7pm but we will meet at a bar for drinks and snacks before the show and go over as a group. If people want to meet early we can get dinner. We can also have a few post-movie beers as well. This will be a great way to meet members of this meet up and make some connections before the snow starts falling. The Somerville Theatre is in the middle of Davis Sq, about a 50 ft walk from the RedLine station.

Buy your tickets on your own as soon as possible, it will sell out - Somerville Theatre
http://feitheatres.co...

also check out the Warren Miller web site
http://www.skinet.com...
item.how_to_find_us: look for us just past the entrance to Orleans!
item.name: Warren Miller Ski Movie + pre-meetup
